author: world today news
title: Eating These Vegetables Reduces Cholesterol and Maintains Heart Health: New Medical Studies
text: Some recent medical studies have revealed that eating a few vegetables reduces blood cholesterol and maintains heart [health](https://www.world-today-news.com/category/health/). One of the [health](https://www.world-today-news.com/category/health/) reports stated that there is a group of vegetables that have a major role in reducing the level of cholesterol in the blood, which are broccoli and cauliflower, in addition to radishes, carrots, and cabbage.
